Well ya know, thats what the pic was for. As you can see. Attached to the cockpit is an upside down "MK2 to size 1 adapter". Then another one is attached to that. But backwards, making a super nice and smooth, fuel holding body.

But the wings and engines are attached inside the first piece, like so. Then you snap the second MK2 adapter on to hide all that.

Also cupcake... taught me it's much more effective to stack the missiles one on top of the other. This makes them far more accurate, and reduces weight. Look at any of his dropships to see what I mean
alrigthy, there were way more votes for me to make it more stable than to make it an SSTO, so I'll be releasing the Mk. 3 soon
